fixed_xml: <ITEM>4. Man sucht <BIBL><TITLE>Ulacg Tabellen der Sinuum & tangentium</TITLE>, deutsch, <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>, <YEAR>1738</YEAR></BIBL>. Item <BIBL><AUTHOR>Wolfens</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anfangs-Grunde aller mathematischen Wissenschaften</TITLE>, <VOLUME>Theile</VOLUME>, <YEAR>1748</YEAR></BIBL>. der Liebhaber ist im Berichthaus zu erfragen.</ITEM>
explanation: The AUTHOR tag in the second BIBL tag was incorrectly formatted with an equals sign. It has been corrected to a standard XML tag.
